mapper.select: select nvl(max(code1), 'not') as code1 from make_code where code1 like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyddmm') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into make_code values((select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyddmm') from dual) || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}), '000')

insert into number_ticket values( (select (code1 || code2) + 1 as code from make_code where code1 like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyddmm') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number})), 1, #{the_number}, #{license_number}, #{member_tel}, 0)

insert into number_ticket values( (select (ticket_code + 1) as ticket_code from (select ticket_code from number_ticket where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyyddmm') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%' order by ticket_code desc) where rownum <= 1), (select (wait_number+1) as wait_number from (select wait_number from number_ticket where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyyddmm') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%' order by wait_number desc) where rownum <= 1), #{the_number}, #{license_number}, #{member_tel}, 0)
mapper.update: update number_ticket set wait_number = case when wait_number = -1 then 0 when ticket_status = 0 then (wait_number-1) when ticket_status = 1 then wait_number when ticket_status = 2 then (wait_number-1) else wait_number end, ticket_status = case when wait_number = 0 then (ticket_status+1) else ticket_status end where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyyddmm') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%'
mapper.select: select case when ticket_status = 0 then '대기' end as wait, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 0 group by ticket_status

select case when ticket_status = 1 then '발급완료' end as success, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 1 group by ticket_status

select case when ticket_status = 2 then '발급취소' end as cancel, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 2 group by ticket_status

select case when ticket_status = 3 then '부재' end as absence, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 3 group by ticket_status
